title: "The Journey to the Center: Understanding Time and the Self"
first_phrase: This text describes the importance of finding balance and centering oneself in order to avoid feeling divided and searching for fulfillment in external things. It discusses the concept of the Enneagram and its relation to human psychology, and how it can be used to understand our internal thought patterns and behaviors. The author notes that fixation on ego and recurring thoughts can lead to a fear of inadequacy and an imbalance in life. However, by climbing up the energetic ladder and overcoming these fixations, one can find balance and achieve an equilibrium in life. The text is a fascinating exploration of human psychology and growth.
content: Osservazioni sperimentali: Fissazioni della struttura dell’ego e pensieri ricorrenti che ci portano nel “Tempo” TE188 Paura di base: Ho paura di… Ego (faccio come se fossi…) / driver comportamentale Comportam. Mostra che fai!” Orgoglio 3 …non essere capace a fare Provo di essere capace a fare “fa!” “abbi successo!” Menzogna Vanità 4 …essere inadeguato Voglio provare di essere adeguato Invidia 5 …non essere niente/non avere niente Voglio provare di valere “sii perfetto (dettagli)!” Avarizia (paura di perdersi dando) 6 …essere solo/debole Devo connettermi “fai attenzione agli altri!” Paura 7 …essere incompleto Devo completarmi/ sperimentare “fa!” Ingordigia 8 …non avere potere/vulnerabilità Devo provare che ho potere sugli altri Lussuria La Salita Energetica Arrivati a questo punto di soluzione delle compulsioni, l’uomo ha realizzato un grande risultato simboleggiata dall’equilibrio.
last_phrase: In conclusion, by identifying our base fears and ego-driven behaviors, we can work towards achieving balance and even reach higher levels of spiritual elevation. Dante's ascent up the mountain in Purgatorio represents the journey towards a modified perception of time and a deeper understanding of the quantum reality of the world. With dedication and practice, we can all strive for a state of perfect happiness and enlightenment.
